name: craftiness

behaviour that is clever, and sometimes also slightly dishonest: She gets her way by a mixture of craftiness and determination. She was delighted at her own craftiness at bringing them together. See
crafty
More examplesFewer examplesThe serpent deceived Eve by his craftiness.The nature of peacemaking is not to fight but to confront "the opponent" with intelligence, craftiness, humor and a thirst for justice. Whether by craftiness or desperation, they avoided out-thinking themselves and did the screamingly obvious.
